name: PaperPlanes
description:
Control a paper plane as it floats through a park. Watch out for obstacles! Player that goes the farthest wins!

Supports 1, 2, or 4 local players

Created for Challenge 2016

Supports Game controllers.

Keyboard Controls:

Play Again: Enter

Pause: ESC

Player 1 - Move: Up/Down, Ready to race: Right Shift

Player 2 - Move: W/S, Ready to race: Left Shift

Player 3 - Move: F/V, Ready to race: C

Player 4 - Move: I/K, Ready to race: O
